metadata.title: CVE-2014-3578 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in Pivotal Spring Framework 3.x before 3.2.9 and 4.0 before 4.0.5 allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a crafted URL. It was discovered that Spring Framework incorrectly handled URL inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to read arbitrary files.

criterions.comment: libspring-java package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.12-1').
